Hello blank fragment
Welcome to R\'Lifts I want to get a Ride I want to be a Driver Open the navigation drawer by pressing the menu icon in the top-left corner. From this menu, you have a few options, described in detail below.
View your profile information. Opens a list of rides near you that you can request. Allows you post a ride. Once your ride is posted, riders near you will be able to see it and request your ride. If a rider requests your ride, you\'ll receive a notification Add mile tokens to your account via PayPal Look at the rides and drivers you have requested in the past. From this menu, you have a few options, described in detail below.\n \u2022Profile: View your profile information.\n \u2022Rider: Opens a list of rides near you that you can request. You can filter the list by.... (to be added)\n \u2022Driver: Allows you to register as a driver and post a ride. Once your ride is posted, riders near you will be able to see it and request your ride. If a rider requests your ride, you\'ll receive a notification and can either accept or decline their request.\n \u2022Add Tokens: Add mile tokens to your account via PayPal, which is the currency used by riders to pay drivers. If you do not have enough tokens, you will not be allowed to request the ride.\n \u2022Ride History: Look at the rides and drivers you have requested in the past.\n \u2022Logout: Logout of your account.\n Thanks for using RLifts! :) \n Ride Filtering Options: Leave Time: Cost
